title: Program Level Navigation Simplification
details:
Updated VaultIndexProcessor navigation logic to improve the user experience at the Program Level by removing unnecessary back navigation.

## Change Details:
- **Program Level (hierarchyLevel == 1)**: Now shows only "ğŸ  [[Home]] | ğŸ“Š [[Dashboard]] | ğŸ“ [[Classes Assignments]]" without the back navigation
- **All other levels**: Continue to show the full navigation with back link "ğŸ”™ [[BackTarget|BackText]] | ğŸ  [[Home]] | ğŸ“Š [[Dashboard]] | ğŸ“ [[Classes Assignments]]"

## Rationale:
- At Program Level, users are already at the top organizational level below the main vault root
- Back navigation from Program Level would just go to the vault root (Home), which is redundant with the Home link
- This creates a cleaner, less cluttered navigation experience
- Maintains all other navigation elements (Home, Dashboard, Assignments) for consistency

## Implementation:
- Modified the navigation generation logic in GenerateIndexContentAsync method
- Added conditional logic to handle Program Level differently
- Reorganized the navigation code for better readability and maintainability
- Moved the root index filename lookup outside the conditional blocks for efficiency

- All 19 VaultIndexProcessor tests pass
- All 6 VaultCommands CLI tests pass  
- No regressions introduced
